content: The reciprocal rights and duties that must exist between humans and robots were outlined in the World Declaration on Robots' Rights, drafted and approved in 2004, in Fukuoka, Japan.
translations: ita:I diritti e doveri reciproci che devono esistere tra uomo e robot sono stati delineati nella Dichiarazione mondiale sui
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
